body.name: Mounting Dream UL Listed Lockable RV TV Mount for Most 17-43 inch TV, RV Mount for Camper Trailer Motor Home Boat Truck, Full Motion Unique One Step Lock RV TV Wall Mount, VESA 200mm, 44 lbs, MD2210
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: HEAVY DUTY TV MOUNT - UL listed lockable RV TV mount fits for most 17-43 Inch TVs up to 44lbs, with VESA/mounting holes spacing of 100x100mm, 200x100mm, 200x200mm. If the TV VESA is 100x200mm, you can check Mounting Dream MD2212 RV mounts for the best options. Technology of robot welding makes whole unit sturdy and safe.unit sturdy and safe.

UNIQUE LOCKING MECHANISM DESIGN - Locking mechanism of RV mount secures swivel arms and TV plate at one time when vehicle in motion to prevent any bumps. Easily lock and release your TV with the pulling strap.

EASY INSTALLATION - RV TV wall mount with decent instruction and all included hardware in pre-labeled bags . The wooden board in vehicle should be thicker than 1/2 inch . +/-5 degrees post-installation adjustment allows perfect TV leveling

VIEWING BECOMES MORE COMFORTABLE - RV TV bracket tilts TV up 5 degrees and down 15 degrees to reduce glare , swivels TV left or right according to your seat . Pull out to 18 . 4’’ and retract back to 2 . 8’’ , making your TV flexible to move
US BASED CUSTOMER SUPPORT: We are glad to answer your pre-purchase and installation questions . Our RV mount is 10-year warranted!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Mounting Dream With more than 20 years of production and design, Mounting Dream is dedicated to quality and affordable TV accessories, like universal TV mounts, TV stand, soundbar brackets, lockable TV mount for RV camper, TV covers, speaker stands and etc. We believe, customer is always the key to every design, and so far, we have served millions of families. The number is still growing. We value every voice of you! Take it and enjoy your TV shows! Mounting Dream, your safe and simple mounting choice!

Full Motion RV TV Mount--Tilting Angle Adjustment Want to reduce glare from lights？ Pull TV to your desired angle, then fasten tilting bolt and tighten the tilting handle. Full Motion RV TV Mount--Extend and Retract TV Want to point your TV exactly where you want it? Hold TV’s two sides and extend it out. Full Motion RV TV Mount--Swivel Angle Adjustment Want to get a better view? It is easy and quick to swivel your TV with the articulating arms. Full Motion RV TV Mount--Level After Installation Want to level TV anytime? Loosen 2 leveling bolts by maximum 2 turns and re-tighten to secure after adjusting.

-15°/+5° tilting to reduce screen glare The RV TV mount can tilt your TV forward 15° and backward 5° to reduce the glare from light. 18.4" Long arm extension The RV TV wall mount can fully extend 18.4" from wall to point your TV exactly where you want to view it from. 90° swivel for better viewing angle Want to watch movie with your family from any seat in the room? Now you can adjust your RV mount left or right 90° for the optimal view.

Fits 17-43 inch TVs This RV TV mount fits most 17-43 inch TVs, up to 44 lbs. TV mount for RV fits TVs with mounting holes 75x75mm, 100x100mm, 200x100mm, 200x200mm. Retracts 2.4 Inch Low Profile, Extends 18.4 Inch From The Wall Tilt, swivel and rotate function +5°/-15° tilt, +/-90° swivel and +/-5° rotation For maximum viewing flexibility, provide smooth adjustment for all directions, making it easy to view your TV from multi-angles. Heavy-Duty Steel Construction, 44 Lbs. Loading Capacity RV mount Constructed with heavy-duty steel material with durable powder-coated finish. This TV mount is 100% welded by automatic robot. This advanced welding technology makes the full motion TV wall mount sturdy, and ensures mounted TV stable and secure, supporting TV weight up to 44 lbs. Includes All Necessary Mounting Hardware TV wall mounts ship with hardware for both wall and TV mounting. This RV TV mounts fit solid wooden board which should be thicker than 1/2 inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We have three of these now. These TV mounts are EXCELLENT!
reviews.reviewText: We have a 65” TV in the living room, a 43” TV in the bedroom and a 50” TV in the office. These brackets are designed good, well made and easy to install. We couldn’t be happier with any other TV wall mount than we are with the Mounting Dream brand. If we add a TV in the garage, which we are seriously considering, we will buy another one of these for that TV as well. They can tilt, they can turn, they hold their position. They are flat out awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: I just installed this on my boat, and I love it so far. Very sturdy. Feels heavy. The arm has a nice amount of friction. Comes with all the needed hardware and even includes a small bubble level for mounting perfectly level. One of the best features for a boat or RV is the arm locking feature. It will not lock with the arm extended. But when in the stowed position it locks very securely. I think it will be fine in any type of wave motion we may encounter. Make sure your TV is designed for a VESA standard mount. If not, get a universal type. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: This works great with my travel trailer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend to a friend
reviews.reviewText: The only thing keeping me from giving this 5 stars is that the mount does not sit flush to the TV. This could be the fault of the tv, but the screws provided were too long. I have the 24" spectre with DVD player and it just sort of hangs on the mount. It is good enough and the mount is awesome. It keeps the tv stable while we drive the rv, it is good quality, and the lock mechanism is easy to use. I would recommend that you purchase it as it is affordable and works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great RV Mount!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. Great for a RV. It holds the TV in place during travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camper road tested
reviews.reviewText: A few trips in and holds great. You have to be sure it locks though! I forgot or didn't latch and it was out after a bumpy ride one time... It held strong and still latches and holds on rough roads. Surprised, honestly! Great buy for being so cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Once we read the directions it was very easy to install! Able to position many different ways. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great RV tv mount
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to mount a 32" smart tv in the bedroom of our RV. The kit comes complete with screws and spacers to attach the plate to the tv. It even includes a small level. The mount is very well-made and can be adjusted in all directions. The locking mechanism is very well designed. The best wall mount kit I have purchased.
En general es un buen producto, con el tiempo y en ciertas posiciones cuando sacas la pantalla se ve chueca

Hay que tener en cuenta el peso. Yo he tenido que reforzar el sitio donde lo he colocado. Una vez puesto, es robusto y aguanta muy bien el peso de la TV. Otra cosa a tener en cuenta es el anclaje que lleva para cuando te estás moviendo, perfecto.
Ce produit n'est pas adapté au camping car car la télé vibre en roulant donc bruit a ne pas acheter l'album

Bin sehr zufrieden mit der Halterung. Habe diese in meinem Wohnwagen eingebaut, wo sie sehr gut verstaut werden kann, auch während der Fahrt. Der Halter geht nicht auf und der Fernseher bleibt an seinem Platz. Ist sehr stabil und mit mehreren Löchern für diverse Fernseheraufnahmen vorgebohrt. Allerdings sollte man im Wohnwagen dann doch eher durchgehende metrische Schrauben nehmen und nicht die mitgelieferten, da die gelieferten Schrauben in den dünnen Wänden der Wohnwagenmöbel schlecht halten. Aber Preis-Leistung ist bestens!

Montato nel mio camper prodotto perfetto per ogni misura, lato negativo un po’ pesante ma sicuramente molto robusto. Dotato di blocco per il viaggio è corredato di ogni tipo di viteria e distanziali per cui sarete certamente in grado di montare qualsiasi tipo di televisione.Sono comprese anche le viti per fissarlo su superfici in legno.
